title: Enhancing Hospitality Practical Skills: Integrating Ethnic Culture and Mathematical Thinking Through Work-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can design real-world problem-solving strategies through mathematical simulations reflecting ethnocultural contexts.
Learners can demonstrate mathematical communication skills that account for cultural differences in VR-based collaborative tasks.
Learners can apply mathematical analysis skills required to complete practical tasks incorporating ethnocultural elements through project-based assessments.
